content: Dov’è Isabella Ricci? Il mistero si infittisce, la dama del Trono Over è ancora la grande assente di queste puntate. Ed ora non si fa che parlare di altro, uno solo interrogativo aleggia sul web: Perchè la signora del parterre femminile non è più seduta tra le file di Uomini e Donne? window._tgvtag = window._tgvtag || []; window._tgvtag.players = window._tgvtag.players || [];window._tgvtag.players.push( { 'placement': 'videoplayer-outstream','id': 778, 'type': 'outstream'} ); Uomini e Donne, Isabella Ricci è la grande assente Torna puntuale, l’appuntamento quotidiano con Uomini e Donne il talk sui sentimenti condotto dall’impareggiabile Queen Mari. In questi ultimi giorni un fitto mistero si abbattuto sul programma cult di Canale 5, tutti si pongono un interrogativo a cui non sembra esserci una risposta chiara: che fine ha fatto Isabella Ricci? Isabelle Ricci è la grande assente di cui tutti, ma proprio tutti parlano. La dama dai grigi capelli solleva curiosità anche quando non è presente. In seguito ad una discussione che Isabella ha avuto con il cavaliere Armando Incarnato, supportato da Ida Platano, Gemma Galgani ed anche Gianni Sperti, secondo molti, la Ricci avrebbe preferito non presentarsi più in studio. Ma è davvero così? Isabella ha deciso di abbandonare Uomini e Donne perchè stanca delle continue accuse ed illazioni sul suo conto? Non possiamo saperlo, la dama dai grigi capelli per il momento non si è ancora espressa al riguardo, ha preferito mantenere il silenzio. Uomini e Donne, perchè la Ricci non è in studio? Ma in rete c’è chi è convinto che la dama abbai preferito andar via, per mettere a tacere qualsivoglia pettegolezzo. Di fatto in studio, solo qualche puntata fa, Isabella è stata duramente attaccata da alcuni cavalieri e dame del Trono Over, che hanno sostenuto che sia in cerca di successo e visibilità sui social e null’altro. LEGGI ANCHE -> Natalia Titova e Rosolino, il selfie fa impazzire i fan: come si sono mostrati LEGGI ANCHE -> Uomini e donne, il dramma di Luca: la dura confessione Gemma Galgani, la sua competitor è pronta a giurare che Isabella ambisca a diventare un’ influencer over 60, e che quindi brami le telecamere per raggiungere il suo obiettivo. Proprio per le accuse che le sono state mosse, c’è chi è pronto a sostenere che la dama abbia deciso di andare via e con un gesto, quello della sua assenza, far comprendere a chi ha messo in dubbio la sua veridicità, quanto si sbagliasse. The post Uomini e Donne, che fine ha fatto Isabella? Perché non è al trono over appeared first on Solonotizie24.
full_description: Dov’è Isabella Ricci? Il mistero si infittisce, la dama del Trono Over è ancora la grande assente di queste puntate. Ed ora non si fa che parlare di altro, uno solo interrogativo aleggia sul web: Perchè la signora del parterre femminile non è più seduta tra le file di Uomini e Donne? Torna puntuale, l’appuntamento quotidiano con Uomini e Donne il talk sui sentimenti condotto dall’impareggiabile Queen Mari. In questi ultimi giorni un fitto mistero si abbattuto sul programma cult di Canale 5, tutti si pongono un interrogativo a cui non sembra esserci una risposta chiara: che fine ha fatto Isabella Ricci? Isabelle Ricci è la grande assente di cui tutti, ma proprio tutti parlano. La dama dai grigi capelli solleva curiosità anche quando non è presente. In seguito ad una discussione che Isabella ha avuto con il cavaliere Armando Incarnato , supportato da Ida Platano, Gemma Galgani ed anche Gianni Sperti, secondo molti, la Ricci avrebbe preferito non presentarsi più in studio. Ma è davvero così? Isabella ha deciso di abbandonare Uomini e Donne perchè stanca delle continue accuse ed illazioni sul suo conto? Non possiamo saperlo, la dama dai grigi capelli per il momento non si è ancora espressa al riguardo, ha preferito mantenere il silenzio. Ma in rete c’è chi è convinto che la dama abbai preferito andar via, per mettere a tacere qualsivoglia pettegolezzo. Di fatto in studio, solo qualche puntata fa, Isabella è stata duramente attaccata da alcuni cavalieri e dame del Trono Over , che hanno sostenuto che sia in cerca di successo e visibilità sui social e null’altro. Gemma Galgani , la sua competitor è pronta a giurare che Isabella ambisca a diventare un’ influencer over 60, e che quindi brami le telecamere per raggiungere il suo obiettivo. Proprio per le accuse che le sono state mosse, c’è chi è pronto a sostenere che la dama abbia deciso di andare via e con un gesto, quello della sua assenza, far comprendere a chi ha messo in dubbio la sua veridicità, quanto si sbagliasse.

title: Chloe Zhao készen áll arra, hogy megrendezze az Örökkévalók folytatását
creator: Czégé Zoltán
description: Bármit elvállal, amire Kevin Feige felkéri A független filmek világából érkező Chloe Zhao nagyon élvezte első MCU-s forgatását, és szívesen visszatérne a Marvelhez a jövőben.
full_description: Valamivel több mint egy hét van hátra az Örökkévalók premierjéig, de a külföldi kritikák már befutottak az ambiciózus Marvel-filmről. Ezek alapján elég megosztóra sikerült A nomádok földjéért idén Oscar-díjat nyerő Chloe Zhao első képregény-adaptációja. Vannak ugyanis, akik szerint az Örökkévalók erőssége az, hogy a független filmes rendező egyedi látásmódja átitatja az alkotást, vannak, akik szerint pont emiatt nem annyira jó, mások viszont éppen azért panaszkodnak, mert Zhao szerzői kézjegye nem kap elég nagy hangsúlyt. A rendezőnő mindenesetre nagyon élvezte az Örökkévalók forgatását, és a The Playlistnek adott interjúban elmondta, hogy szívesen visszatérne egy folytatásra. "Azt élveztem ennek a filmnek a készítésében, hogy nagyon szorosan kapcsolódott az MCU eredetéhez, és nagy hatása van az MCU folytatására is. Ezt a két dolgot biztosítva eljátszadozhattunk bármivel, amivel akartunk, egy erős önálló filmet csinálhattunk, mindent kipakoltunk az asztalra. Egy pillanat alatt visszatérnék, hogy újra a Marvel csapatával dolgozzak, az biztos. Szóval majd meglátjuk." Zhao az interjúban azt is elárulta, hogy amikor megkeresték az Örökkévalók rendezésével kapcsolatban, az ötletelést két dologgal kezdte: Google-ön rákeresett homokot ábrázoló makró fotókra, valamint elővette az angol költő, William Blake egyik versét, és ezekkel állított be Kevin Feige stúdiófőnökhöz a megbeszélésre. A szóban forgó költemény a rendező szerint tökéletesen összefoglalja a saját vízióját az Örökkévalókról. Blake egyik legismertebb művéről, Az ártatlanság jövendölései ről van szó, amely a következő sorokkal kezdődik: "Egy porszem világot jelent / S egy szál vadvirág az eget / Fogd föl tenyeredben a végtelent / S egy percben élj évezredet." (Kálnoky László fordítása) A beszélgetés során felvetődött az is, hogy Feige produceri felügyelete mellett készül egy Star Wars-mozi is , a projektnek azonban még nincs rendezője. Arra a kérdésre, hogy ezt vállalná-e, a rendezőnő nevetve azt válaszolta, hogy igen, bármit elvállal, amire Feige felkéri. Az Örökkévalók november 4-től lesz látható a magyar mozikban.

title: Katarzyna Warnke zjechała zwiastun "Dziewczyn z Dubaju". Doda odpowiada. Widać, że jest wściekła [PLOTEK EXCLUSIVE]
creator: Cezary Wiśniewski
description: Doda uważa, że nie powinno oceniać się książki po okładce. Według niej "Dziewczyny z Dubaju" nie przedstawiają w dobrym świetle najstarszego zawodu na świecie.
full_description: Więcej o aferze związanej z "Dziewczynami z Dubaju" przeczytasz na stronie głównej Gazeta.pl. Na jubileuszowym pokazie marki MMC Katarzyna Warnke dała do zrozumienia w rozmowie z Plotkiem, że według niej zwiastun "Dziewczyn z Dubaju" jest promocją prostytucji. Doda , producentka kreatywna filmu , twierdzi, że aktorka odniosła złe wrażenie. Doda i Max debiutują razem na imprezie. Za kulisami nie brakowało czułości! Katarzyna Warnke została zapytana przez naszego reportera, jak z punktu widzenia aktorki odbiera to, co dzieje się wokół "Dziewczyn z Dubaju". Oceniła, co widziała do tej pory - zwiastun. Podczas Wielkiej Gali Plejady spytaliśmy Dodę, czy Katarzyna Warnke odniosła dobre wrażenie. Czy piosenkarka utrzymuje kontakt z aktorkami, które zaangażowała do pracy na planie filmu? Rabczewska podkreśliła ponadto, że nie wybiera się na uroczystą premierę, która zaplanowana jest na 22 listopada. My czekamy na film z niecierpliwością!

Kareena turned heads in her yellow caption Gucci t-shirt, while Saif was dressed a little formally in a pair of white trousers and a blue t-shirt. title: Vijay pays full entry tax for Rolls Royce Ghost, now wants judge’s critical remarks expunged
full_description: Tamil movie star Vijay has moved the Madras High Court seeking to expunge all critical remarks made by Justice SM Subramaniam against him while hearing his earlier petition for entry tax relief on his luxurious Rolls Royce Ghost. Senior advocate Vijay Narayan, who appeared on behalf of Vijay, informed the court that the actor has paid the full entry tax of over Rs 32 lakh for his car in August. He later requested the two-judge bench to expunge the harsh comments made against Vijay. Also Read | Suriya on Jai Bhim: It is important to know our past to have a beautiful future The advocate informed the court that the judge’s remarks had caused a lot of pain to Vijay, besides painting him like a criminal before the public. The court has reserved the order on the petition for a later date. https://images.indianexpress.com/2020/08/1x1.png In July, the bench headed by Justice Subramaniam took exception to Vijay’s request to exempt him from entry tax for his car, which he had imported from England in 2012. Vijay sought the court’s assistance against the “extraordinary entry tax” imposed on his vehicle, despite having paid the import duty as per the Customs Act during the time of purchase. Justice SM Subramaniam had described the prayer for tax relief as an “anti-national habit” and dismissed his petition. “These Actors are portraying themselves as champion to bring the social justice in the society. Their pictures are against corrupt activities in the society. But, they are evading tax and acting in a manner, which is not in consonance with the provisions of the Statutes,” read the order issued by Justice Subramaniam. The court had also imposed a fine of Rs 1 lakh, which will go to the Chief Minister’s Fund marked for Covid-19 relief work. Vijay later approached a division bench in the Madras High Court. The division bench had stayed the judgement issued by Justice Subramaniam. The court had also granted the actor permission to appeal against Justice Subramaniam’s order and expunge his scathing remarks against him. On the work front, Vijay, who was last seen in Master, is now busy shooting for Beast .

title: Strictly’s Dan Walker and partner Nadiya Bychkova go to dinner together in break from rehearsals

The BBC Breakfast presenter made it through to the Halloween special this weekend after his impressive waltz with Nadiya last Saturday. Dan, 44, looked dapper in a navy bomber jacket and matched it with dark blue trousers. He dressed […]
content: STRICTLY’S Dan Walker and partner Nadiya Bychkova went to dinner together in a break from rehearsals. The BBC Breakfast presenter made it through to the Halloween special this weekend after his impressive waltz with Nadiya last Saturday. BackGridDan looked cool in his blue hoodie on a dance break with Nad[/caption] BackGridNadiya looked glam in her dress and boots as she smiled at Dan[/caption] Dan, 44, looked dapper in a navy bomber jacket and matched it with dark blue trousers. He dressed down his look with a pair of white trainers. Nadiya showed off her trim figure in a baggy grey jumper dress. She flashed some leg by ditching her tights and matched her dress with over the knee boots. The pro dancer wore a thick black winter jumper over her outfit as the duo took a break from gruelling dance rehearsals to grab a bite. Meanwhile furious Strictly fans accused Dan spoiling who went home on Sunday night. Most read in Showbiz 'they took everything' Upset Molly-Mae & Tommy Fury robbed of £800k as gang target home 'POWERFUL' Virgin Media viewers praise 'sweetheart' Hughie Maughan on Living With Lucy 'eyes opened' Strictly's Giovanni Pernice breaks silence on Maura Higgins split 'SHOCK & HEARTACHE' Alec Baldwin's wife breaks silence days after accidental shooting home wrecker Escape to the Chateau's Angel sickened as husband Dick 'undoes years of work' horror assault Damien Dempsey reveals he feared he'd die after Dublin chip shop attack It came after he shared his disappointment on Instagram over rugby ace Ugo Monye getting the boot – just as the results show ended at 8pm last Sunday. He’d written alongside a photo of Ugo and pro dancer Oti Mabuse: “Gutted that @ugomonye is the latest to leave the ballroom. “He’s been the glue which has held us all together over the last few weeks.Take care of that back big man. See you soon. “I know @rocketrhys will come back stronger too #Strictly” The post left some scrolling through Instagram hopping mad, and they aired their frustrations in the comments. One person replied: “Be helpful if you put a spoiler alert first!!! FFs!!” Another added: “So sad when everything needs to be on social media….let people watch in their own time…..silence is golden” Dan made it through to next week’s show Fans accused him of ‘spoiling’ the results show by announcing Ugo was leaving too early

title: Udienza Assange, Amnesty “annullare le accuse, no all’estradizione, sì alla scarcerazione
creator: Amnesty International
description: Alla vigilia dell’udienza contro la decisione di un tribunale del Regno Unito di non estradare Julian Assange negli Usa, la segretaria generale di Amnesty International Agnès Callamard ha chiesto alle autorità statunitensi di annullare le accuse nei confronti dell’imputato e alle autorità britanniche di… Amnesty International
full_description: Alla vigilia dell’udienza contro la decisione di un tribunale del Regno Unito di non estradare Julian Assange negli Usa, la segretaria generale di Amnesty International Agnès Callamard ha chiesto alle autorità statunitensi di annullare le accuse nei confronti dell’imputato e alle autorità britanniche di non estradarlo e scarcerarlo immediatamente. Callamard ha reiterato queste richieste dopo che un’indagine di Yahoo News ha rivelato che i servizi statunitensi avevano valutato di rapire o uccidere Assange mentre si trovava all’interno dell’ambasciata dell’Ecuador di Londra. Queste rivelazioni indeboliscono ancora di più le già inaffidabili assicurazioni diplomatiche fornite dagli Usa che, se estradato, Assange non sarebbe posto in condizioni equivalenti a maltrattamento. “Le assicurazioni che il governo Usa non porrebbe Assange in una prigione di massima sicurezza né lo sottoporrebbe alle Misure amministrative speciali, sono state contraddette dall’ammissione, sempre da parte degli Usa, che queste garanzie potrebbero venir meno. Il fatto che la Cia abbia preso in considerazione di rapire o uccidere Assange solleva ancora maggiori dubbi sulla credibilità delle promesse statunitensi e mette ulteriormente in evidenza le motivazioni politiche che si celano dietro questa vicenda” , ha dichiarato Callamard. “A quasi 20 anni di distanza, nessuna delle persone sospettate di crimini di guerra commessi dagli Usa nelle guerre dell’Afghanistan e dell’Iraq è stata incriminata né tantomeno condannata, mentre colui che ha rivelato tali crimini rischia di trascorrere il resto della sua vita in carcere” , ha aggiunto Callamard. L’udienza del 27 e del 28 ottobre dovrà esaminare le cinque motivazioni su cui si basa l’appello presentato dagli Usa contro la decisione presa a gennaio da una corte di grado inferiore di non estradare Assange. Soprattutto, dovrà giudicare la credibilità delle assicurazioni fornite dagli Usa circa il trattamento di Assange, che Amnesty International giudica inaffidabili. Gli Usa accusano Assange di aver cospirato, insieme all’analista delle forze armate Chelsea Manning, per ottenere illegalmente informazioni riservate. Ai sensi dell’Atto sullo spionaggio e dell’Atto sulle frodi informatiche, rischia fino a 175 anni di carcere. L’incriminazione di Assange costituisce una grave minaccia per la libertà di stampa, tanto negli Usa quanto altrove. Assange ha svolto attività professionali proprie dell’esperienza quotidiana del giornalismo investigativo. L’eventuale estradizione di Assange criminalizzerebbe comuni prassi giornalistiche e permetterebbe a quello degli Usa e ad altri governi di prendere di mira giornalisti e scrittori al di fuori delle loro giurisdizioni per aver denunciato le loro malefatte. “L’incessante caccia ad Assange da parte del governo degli Usa è evidentemente una misura punitiva ma in gioco non è solo la sorte di una persona: in pericolo sono la libertà di stampa e la libertà d’espressione. Il giornalismo e l’editoria d’investigazione sono di fondamentale importanza per tenere sotto controllo e denunciare l’operato dei governi e chiamare a rispondere chi viola i diritti umani. Per questo, l’appello degli Usa va respinto, le accuse devono essere annullate e Assange dev’essere scarcerato” , ha concluso Callamard.

title: Masters de N'oubliez pas les paroles : faites vos pronostics et remportez des cadeaux !
description: Les Masters 2021 de N'oubliez pas les paroles démarrent ce mardi 26 octobre sur France 2 ! A cette occasion, Télé-Loisirs vous propose un grand jeu de pronostics avec, à la fin de cette édition, de nombreux cadeaux à gagner. Faites vos jeux !lire la suite sur Télé-Loisirs.fr
full_description: C'est parti pour la neuvième édition des Masters de N'oubliez pas les paroles sur France 2 ! À partir du mardi 26 octobre 2021, et pour plusieurs semaines, 32 des plus grands Maestros de Nagui vont se mesurer les uns aux autres en chansons, avec l'espoir de succéder à Arsène, dernier vainqueur en date de la joute musicale annuelle. À cette occasion, Télé-Loisirs vous invite à vous prendre au jeu et à pronostiquer chaque jour le nom du vainqueur de la rencontre proposée sur France 2. À la clef, des cadeaux pour celles et ceux qui auront cumulé le plus de points. Comme les années précédentes, deux candidats vont s'affronter chaque jour, en deux manches. Le premier round (match aller) aura lieu dès le démarrage de l'émission, à 18 h 40, tandis que le suivant (match retour) prendra place à partir de 19 h 15. La gagnante ou le gagnant de son match accédera, dans un premier temps, aux huitièmes de finale. Et ainsi de suite, jusqu'à la phase finale. Chaque jour, Télé-Loisirs vous propose donc de faire vos pronostics sur le match du jour : la rencontre du jour verra Margaux (n°1) jouer face à Estelle (n°34) . Attention, les votes seront clos chaque jour à 18 h 40 ! Le vainqueur de notre jeu de pronostics pourra remporter une rencontre en visioconférence avec la gagnante ou le gagnant des Masters 2021 de N'oubliez pas les paroles ! À gagner également : une enceinte Bluetooth JBL Flip 5 ainsi que 3 micros de karaoké de la marque BAM karaoke . À défaut de "bloquer des paroles", à vous désormais de "bloquer" vos pronostics en suivant ce lien ou en jouant ci-dessous. Bonne chance ! >>> Retrouvez toutes les informations liées aux Masters 2021 de N'oubliez pas les paroles sur le site événement de Télé-Loisirs . Les résultats des matchs seront quant à eux mis à jour dans cet article .

title: Jimmy Butler Has Officially Joined the $400+ Million Business of Selling Coffee, Starting With a $100,000 ‘Mobile Lab’
creator: Christina Nunn
description: Jimmy Butler used his downtime during the pandemic to build a business around coffee and develop plans for a full-scale operation.
content: Jimmy Butler is a star forward for the Miami Heat. The talented athlete got his start in college before entering the NBA in the 2011 draft. Over the past few years, Butler has won many awards, including being a four-time All-NBA Team honoree and a five-time NBA All-Defensive Team honoree. These days, Butler is still focused on his game, but he’s expanded his hobbies to include a passion for coffee. In fact, the 32-year-old used his downtime during the coronavirus pandemic to build a business around coffee. He’s working on his coffee-making skills and developing plans for a full-scale operation.  When did Jimmy Butler become interested in coffee? The Miami Heat’s Jimmy Butler warms up | Michael Reaves/Getty Images The pandemic forced a lot of NBA players to get creative if they didn’t want to get extremely bored. During the NBA bubble, Butler decided to leverage a life-long interest into a new, marketable skill. In mid-2020, as the Miami Heat stayed in a Disney resort “bubble,” Butler decided to open his own “coffee shop” in his hotel room.  Butler didn’t hesitate to upcharge his coffee either, asking for up to $20 a cup for the gourmet drinks. “You can’t get coffee nowhere here,” Butler said at the time. “So I might bump it up to 30 bucks a cup. Just depends. People here can afford it. So ain’t nobody complaining.” After Butler and his teammates were released from the bubble, he decided to pursue his new venture. The NBA star trademarked a logo and gave his business a name: Big Face Coffee.  Jimmy Butler is serious about building a coffee community #NationalCoffeeDay pic.twitter.com/1LlH22Exhw— Jimmy Butler (@JimmyButler) September 29, 2020 If Butler is hoping for additional income, he could do worse than a coffee business. According to Statista, revenue in the coffee segment amounts to $409,895 million in 2021, with the market is expected to grow annually by 6.99%. For Butler, however, much of his new venture is a labor of love. As he admitted in a recent interview, he’s focused on the community he’s building — full of people who love the simple joy of drinking coffee. As reported by Shopify Plus, Butler said he’s heard “great things” from people about the project. “Everybody is so excited to see what the BIGFACE brand is. Not just coffee, but what the brand has to offer when you’re talking about coffee,” he explained. For now, Butler is working on the digital component of Big Face Coffee. He launched a new website before mapping out the necessary steps to open a chain of brick-and-mortar coffee shops. As Butler admitted, basketball is currently his “main thing” and he wants “to be able to be all in. If I open up a coffee shop, I really want to make coffee.” Fans can buy Jimmy Butler’s coffee merch online Nothing better than sipping some Big Face Coffee with the squad @Uninterrupted x @Toyota #Sienna #ad pic.twitter.com/xI5XtNIOOP— Jimmy Butler (@JimmyButler) April 13, 2021 Fans who want to experience Big Face Coffee should be prepared to drop some serious cash. On the Big Face Brand website, fans can choose from a selection of products. The “Coffee NFT Box” features four coffee varieties and limited-edition artwork, priced at $500. For a more affordable option, you can snag a Big Face Brand hoodie for $120. The cheapest item on the website is a branded mug for $30. At the far end of the spectrum is a $100,000 mobile espresso station that includes all four bean varieties, a mini grinder, electric kettle, exclusive merchandise, and a glass Chemex. The mobile lab is certainly a luxurious way for fans to experience Butler’s bespoke coffee experience. title: „Der Tiger“ bei „The Masked Singer“: Fans sicher – SIE muss es sein

title: Schlagerbooom 2021: Playback-Horror und miese Cover! Blankes Entsetzen nach Silbereisen-Show
creator: news.de-Redakteur Tobias Rüster
description: Mit "Schlagerbooom" wollte Florian Silbereisen endlich wieder eine Volle-Hütte-Party im TV präsentieren. Bei manchem TV-Zuschauer war stattdessen eher "Schlagerbäääh" angesagt. Dank peinlicher Playback-Panne und mieser Song-Auswahl.
full_description: Klingeln Ihnen auch noch die Ohren von "Schlagerbooom", der Show im Ersten mit Florian Silbereisen , in der am Samstagabend so ziemlich alle Künstlerinnen und Künstler zu sehen und hören war, die hierzulande den Vermerk "Schlagersängerin" oder "Schlagersänger" im Künstlerausweis stehen haben? Dagegen wirkte die neue Giovanni-Zarrella-Show im ZDF , mit der das Zweite im vergangenen Monat an den Start gegangen war und Silbereisen endlich Paroli bieten wollte, glatt wie die Eröffnung eines Baumarktes in der brandenburgischen Provinz. Lesen Sie auch: Schock bei Florian Silbereisen! ER ist längst verheiratet und lässt jetzt die Baby-Bombe platzen Ausgelassene 2G-Stimmung in der Dortmunder Westfalenhalle, Florian Silbereisen, der noch aufgedrehter als üblich wirkte und nicht müde wurde zu betonen, wie sehr allen Künstlern das Publikum gefehlt habe und eine Bandbreite an Stars, die an ein gigantisches Schlager-Klassentreffen erinnerte. Von DJ Ötzi über Bernhard Brink und Roland Kaiser sowie Jürgen Drews bis zu Helmut Lotti, Michelle, LaFee, Ross Antony, David Garrett, Thomas Anders, Matthias Reim und Christin Stark. Von Otto Waalkes, Bülent Ceylan, Dieter Hallervorden und Hape Kerkeling bis zu Ramon Roselly, Ben Zucker und Beatrice Egli. Da bleiben doch keine Wünsche offen, oder? Es ist wie so oft im Leben: Kann sein, muss aber nicht. Denn während sich Florian Silbereisen und seine Gäste (der vermeintlich zu vermissende Rest hatte sich bekanntlich auf die Zarrella-Seite geschlagen) wie zur besten Vor-Corona-Zeit beim "Schlagerbooom" an sich selbst berauschen und sich in Party-Ekstase klatschen und schreien, flippen die TV-Zuschauer teilweise regelrecht aus. Allerdings aus anderem Grund. Beim Kurznachrichtendienst Twitter geht so manche Bombe in Form eines Tweets hoch. Ob das mit dem "Schlagerbooom" so gemeint war? Wohl eher nicht. Doch besonders eine Tatsache scheint die Menschen so richtig auf die Palme zu bringen. Vom 2G-Kuschel-Bussel-Abtanz-Alarm einmal ganz abgesehen, ist es vor allem die bisweilen miese Playback-Darbietung der Künstler, die die Twitter-Nutzer verzweifeln lässt. Davon bleibt auch Florian Silbereisen nicht verschont: "Playback, Texte zum Ablesen und vorgefertigte Banner für die Zuschauer in der Halle, das ist der #schlagerboom. Dazu noch ein #2G-Superspreader-Event.", "ARD inszeniert heute Jugendlichkeit in einer Art Mini-Playback-Show. Präsentiert wird das peinlich überinszenierte Lippenbewegen von einem 40-jährigen, der selbst auf dem Kongress der Kindermoderatoren als peinlich anbiedernd auffallen würde." Das Playback kann dann schon zu peinlichen Aussetzern führen, doch auch dafür haben die Twitter-Nutzer einen Hinweis: "Tipp: Immer 3 Sekunden warten nach Playback-Ende, bis das Mikro wieder angeschaltet ist. #Schlagerbooom", lässt ein Zuschauer wissen. "#Schlagerbooom Die Künstler treten alle auf nach dem Motto: Playback gegen Payback €€€€", heißt es an anderer Stelle. Vielleicht ist es doch so einfach. Vielleicht hätte der eine oder andere Zuschauer über dieses bekannte Dilemma noch hinweggesehen. Wäre da nicht die Songauswahl gewesen, mit der die Mehrheit der Künstlerinnen und Künstler sich beim "Schlagerbooom" präsentierte. Ein Tweet mit der Frage: "Hä ist das heute #Schlagerboom - wir covern EDITION?", bringt es da schon genau auf den Punkt. Eine durchaus gefährliche Situation, wenn man es als Silbereisen-Zuschauer falsch angeht: "Für jedes Cover einen Kurzen. Bin seit 30 Minuten blau. #Schlagerbooom", heißt es in einem Tweet, der das Ausmaß der Cover-Songs zum Ausdruck bringen soll. Selbst die ganz Großen lassen davon nicht die Finger: "Jetzt singt Roland auch noch n Cover - in englisch. Das ist nicht mehr mein Schlagerboom. Und auch Elvis wäre dagegen!", wütet ein Fan im Netz. Mit diesem Gefühl ist er nicht alleine: "Lauter Covers heute! Schrecklich! Die finden nix mehr Neues anscheinend! Zeigefinger nach oben Frau Cher fallen eben alle 124 künstlichen Teile aus dem Gesicht!", "Ich möchte keine schlechten cover mehr hören Laut schreiendes Gesicht gebt mir doch bitte einfach Wolfgang Petry" und "Marianne Rosenberg in der gleichen Z-Veranstaltung „Schlagerbooom" mit einem Cover von „Don't leave me this way". Sind alle deutschen Schlagerkomponisten an Corona gestorben?", lauten einige wütende Kommentare zu Silbereisen-Show. Da erscheint eine Baumarkt-Eröffnung in Brandenburg gleich in ganz neuem Licht, oder? Folgen Sie News.de schon bei Facebook und YouTube ? Hier finden Sie brandheiße News, aktuelle Videos, tolle Gewinnspiele und den direkten Draht zur Redaktion. rut/news.de

title: Director James Gunn Reveals His Frustrations About the Alec Baldwin ‘Rust’ Set Tragedy: ‘People Weren’t Following Safety Protocols’
creator: Andrew Addessi
description: “I say all of this as a reminder to myself as I am about to start production, as well as to everyone else involved in making films,”
content: The accident on the set of Rust with Alec Baldwin has affected many celebrities and workers in the film industry, including director James Gunn. He reflected on the event and responses. He expressed his frustrations of Hollywood favoring a ‘time is money’ attitude rather than the safety of those on set. James Gunn | Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic James Gunn responded to the Alec Baldwin ‘Rust’ Set Tragedy Several people responded to the events on the Rust set. However, Gunn has experience in the area as a director. One fan suggested that the ban of real guns from movie sets altogether. “The problem is numerous people have died or been grievously injured on film sets in the past couple decades. Almost none of them have been around firearms, but most of them have been because people weren’t following safety protocols,” Gunn tweeted. The problem is numerous people have died or been grievously injured on film sets in the past couple decades. Almost none of them have been around firearms, but most of them have been because people weren’t following safety protocols. https://t.co/afc0GxlxiJ— James Gunn (@JamesGunn) October 23, 2021 The Guardians of the Galaxy director often deals with dangerous equipment on set. Whether on the Alec Baldwin set or any other film, James Gunn emphasized the importance of safety. “Whether working with automobiles, ratchet-pulls, helicopters, drones, forklifts, firearms, or anything even slightly dangerous, producers, directors, heads of department, and all the crew need to make sure all rules are being followed and qualified individuals are involved,” Gunn said. James Gunn cites a culture of ‘rushing and fear’ that led to the accident with Alec Baldwin on the ‘Rust’ set The main concern Gunn cites is Hollywood rushing or skipping safety procedures to make deadlines or keep a schedule. “A culture of constant rushing and fear, which is what so many Hollywood sets are today, doesn’t make movies any better, it doesn’t save money because of all the resultant mistakes, and it certainly doesn’t take into account our well-being, physically or mentally,” Gunn said The Suicide Squad director included himself in the conversation. As a director, he wants to make sure everyone on set remains as safe as possible. James Gunn wants to prevent anything like the Alec Baldwin Rust set tragedy. The discussion around on-set firearms is valuable. But my fear is it’s now obscuring discussing the many ways dozens have died or been grievously injured on movie sets because of irresponsibility, ignoring safety protocols, improper leadership & a set culture of mindless rushing. https://t.co/yaz6P824AS— James Gunn (@JamesGunn) October 25, 2021 “Being present to our work, being cognizant of our co-workers’ health, and following the rules of safety on set may not eradicate all injury and death,” Gunn noted. freak accidents do happen in all workplaces. But it will certainly prevent the vast majority of tragedies.” While Gunn’s sets usually use more fantastical prop weapons, like Bloodsport’s attachments, he still takes as much care as possible. Gunn addressed all dangers on film sets The tragedy with Alec Baldwin on the Rust set made James Gunn evaluate safety on set. Like he said in his tweet, the issue at hand includes more than firearms on movie sets. “I’m addressing…what’s being framed as ‘this specific problem’ by so many on Twitter. Many see it as firearms on set, but I see it as a culture of non-compliance and rushing,’ Gunn said. “Which has resulted in many deaths and horrifying injuries over the past 25 years.” Even though many fans know Gunn for his sci-fi films, he remains diligent. My greatest fear is that someone will be fatally hurt on one of my sets. I pray this will never happen. My heart goes out to all of those affected by the tragedy today on Rust, especially Halyna Hutchins & her family.— James Gunn (@JamesGunn) October 22, 2021 “I say all of this as a reminder to myself as I am about to start production, as well as to everyone else involved in making films,” Gunn added. While his upcoming DC show Peacemaker films, he intends to practice safety in all aspects of the filmmaking process. James Gunn plans to avoid anything like the accident on the Alec Baldwin Rust set. RELATED: Alec Baldwin Was ‘Inconsolable for Hours’ After Fatal Shooting on the Set of ‘Rust,’ Source Says Read the original article from The Cheat Sheet

title: เปิดตัว HOYO-FEST ร่วมมือกับทาง Cafe เพื่อจัดร้านในธีมต่าง ๆ และจำหน่ายสินค้าจากทาง miHoYo แบบจัดเต็ม
description: ย้อนกลับไปเมื่อไม่กี่สัปดาห์ที่ผ่านมาทางแฟนเพจของ Genshin Impact ได้ประกาศเตรียมเปิดตัว HOYO-FEST โดยในแต่ละประเทศจะมีการจับมือร่วมกับทาง Cafe เพื่อจัดร้านในธีมของเกมต่าง ๆ ที่ทาง HOYO-FEST ได้จัดเอาไว้ และภายในงานจะมีการนำสินค้าต่าง ๆ จากเกมสุดโด่งดังจากทาง miHoYo ออกมาวางจะหน่ายที่จะต้องถูกใจเพื่อน ๆ สายสะสมแบบสุด ๆ
content: ย้อนกลับไปเมื่อไม่กี่สัปดาห์ที่ผ่านมาทางแฟนเพจของ Genshin Impact ได้ประกาศเตรียมเปิดตัว HOYO-FEST โดยในแต่ละประเทศจะมีการจับมือร่วมกับทาง Cafe เพื่อจัดร้านในธีมของเกมต่าง ๆ ที่ทาง HOYO-FEST ได้จัดเอาไว้ และภายในงานจะมีการนำสินค้าต่าง ๆ จากเกมสุดโด่งดังจากทาง miHoYo ออกมาวางจะหน่ายที่จะต้องถูกใจเพื่อน ๆ สายสะสมแบบสุด ๆ     สำหรับงาน HOYO-FEST นั้นจะถูกแบ่งออกเป็น 3 ช่วงใหญ่ ๆ และสินค้าที่วางจำหน่าย รวมไปถึงของรางวัลต่าง ๆ จะเปลี่ยนไปตามช่วงเวลา โดยจะแบ่งออกเป็น 3 ช่วงดังนี้ Honkai Impact 3 : 5 พฤศจิกายน - 16 พฤศจิกายน Tears of Themis : 19 พฤศจิกายน - 30 พฤศจิกายน Genshin Impact : 3 ธันวาคม - 14 ธันวาคม แน่นอนว่าสินค้าที่นำมาวางจำหน่ายภายในงานจะมีตั้งแต่พวงกุญแจ , ฟิกเกอร์ , เข็มกลัด , สแตนดี้ , โปสเตอร์ และอื่น ๆ อีกมากมายบอกเลยว่ามีอะไรให้เพื่อน ๆ ได้เสียเงินอีกเป็นจำนวนมากแน่นอน     นอกจากสินค้าต่าง ๆ ที่ทาง HOYO-FEST นำมาวางจำหน่ายตามธีมเกมต่าง ๆ แล้ว พวกเค้ายังได้ออกแบบเซ็ตคอมโบของขนมต่าง ๆ เพื่อให้เข้ากับธีมของตัวละครนั้น และภายในธีมของ Genshin Impact เมื่อเพื่อน ๆ ทำการใช้จ่ายถึงยอดที่กำหนดจะได้รับโปสต์การ์ด และที่รองแก้วแบบสุ่มลายทันที บอกเลยว่าเพื่อน ๆ สายสะสมนั้นไม่ควรพลาด     สำหรับงาน HOYO-FEST จะถูกจัดขึ้นภายในประเทศไทยที่ร้าน Nana Coffee Roasters และตัวกิจกรรมนั้นเป็นการจัดงานแบบ Offline จึงมีความเสี่ยงที่สูง ทำให้ต้องมีการจัดการที่เข้มงวด และบังคับให้เข้าได้เฉพาะคนที่ได้รับวัคซีนครบ 2 โดสเท่านั้น สุดท้ายนี้เพื่อน ๆ ที่สนใจสามารถเข้าไปอ่านรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมของกิจกรรมนี้ รวมไปถึงรับชมสินค้าต่าง ๆ ได้ที่ลิ้งค์นี้

title: Paris Fury reveals daughter was ‘dying in her arms’ during traumatic birth
creator: Lisa McLoughlin
description: PARIS Fury has recalled the horrifying moment her daughter Athena was “dying in her arms” following her traumatic birth. The 31-year-old welcomed the little one in August with her boxing star husband Tyson, 33. The mother-of-six revealed that the two-month-old was born with a fast heartbeat of 300 beats a minute, the norm is around the […]
content: PARIS Fury has recalled the horrifying moment her daughter Athena was “dying in her arms” following her traumatic birth. The 31-year-old welcomed the little one in August with her boxing star husband Tyson, 33. Paris Fury recalled the moment her daughter Athena stopped breathing. Pictured with husband Tyson The two-month-old was born with a fast heartbeat and was rushed to the NICU The mother-of-six revealed that the two-month-old was born with a fast heartbeat of 300 beats a minute, the norm is around the 120 beats mark. Paris said medics tried to slow Athena’s heartbeat down but the Loose Women panelist said it caused “a load of other complications” and she was transferred from the Royal Lancaster Infirmary to Alder Hey Children’s Hospital. The Fury family then endured a nightmare two weeks when the little one was placed into a neo-natal intensive care unit [NICU]. Speaking to OK! magazine, she explained: “We went over there and they sedated her and put her on an incubation, where they put a tube down her throat to breathe. “They put her on tablets to slow her heart down and when they took her off the tube, they thought it was going to be normal. But I think the accumulation of sedatives, painkillers, beta blockers for her heart and everything was just too much.” Most read in Celebrity 'they took everything' Upset Molly-Mae & Tommy Fury robbed of £800k as gang target home 'eyes opened' Strictly's Giovanni Pernice breaks silence on Maura Higgins split 'SHOCK & HEARTACHE' Alec Baldwin's wife breaks silence days after accidental shooting up & adam Adam Woodyatt seen after estranged wife's fury over his I'm A Celeb deal revealed HEARTLESS Steve Allen called Sarah Harding a 'needy, self-imposed alcoholic' before death HAPPY FAMILY Hazel O'Sullivan praises footie partner Andros Townsend for being hands-on-dad “She was in my arms and she stopped breathing and became completely unresponsive. Her heart rate was fading away – she was dying in my arms. “They took her off me, put her on the table and resuscitated her. Tyson came running in. It was horrific. They managed to get her heart going and everything stabilised.” Paris and Tyson were finally able to bring their sixth child home on August 20 and the family of eight were reunited after a stressful ordeal. The heavyweight champ was full of praise for the staff at the Alder Hey Family House Trust in Liverpool, the hospital that looked after Athena.# Speaking on August 18, Tyson said: “I’m just here feeding my little girl. Off the ICU, on the mend, should be going home soon. “Thank you to God and thank you to all the doctors and nurses who have helped her.” Tyson has since set up a GoFundMe page for the hospital, raising nearly £50,000 to date. Athena is their third daughter, following Venezuela, 11, and Valencia Amber, three. They also have three boys – Prince John James, eight, Prince Tyson II, four, and two-year-old Prince Adonis Amaziah. Despite the family’s joy following the new arrival, the couple have also had to overcome heartbreak in recent years too. Paris met 6ft 9in Tyson they were 16 and 17 and got married in front of 300 guests in 2008. They have made no secret of their desire to have a big family, with Tyson recently declaring they wanted 11 children – enough for a “mixed football team.” And while they’ve been blessed with six children, it hasn’t always been easy for the couple. In 2014, they tragically lost a baby when Paris was six months pregnant, and she was forced to endure a stillbirth. The traumatic loss occurred at the same time Tyson’s uncle Hughie died. While Tyson managed to resume his career, just days before his comeback fight against Sefer Seferi in 2018, Paris tragically suffered another miscarriage. Fearing it would impact her husband in the ring, or have an effect on his mental health, she decided not to tell him until after the fight. Soon after the fight, Paris fell pregnant with son Tyson, who they welcomed three months prematurely. Now, the family are a stronger unit than ever before, with Tyson recently saying: “Got a beautiful wife, beautiful kids, they’re all healthy. That’s the most important thing, you know, your health and your family.” Tyson is proud of his roots in the travelling community and while he wants his children grow up with the same values, the boxer is keen to break tradition in some ways to provide what he believes is best for his kids. Despite Paris saying their children would likely leave school aged 11 and stay at home until they marry, Tyson has said: “I would be very, very proud if one of my children were to be the first [of the family] to graduate from university. “Maybe we could even have the first Dr Fury one day.” Paris and Tyson pictured on their wedding day The boxer pictured with his three sons (L-R): Prince Adonis Amaziah, Prince Tyson II and Prince John James We pay for your stories! Do you have a story for The Sun Showbiz team? Email digishowbiz@the-sun.co.uk or call us direct on 02077824220 . We pay for videos too. Click here to upload yours.

title: *** BILDplus Inhalt *** „Rust“-Beleuchter - „Ich hielt Halyna in meinen Armen, als sie starb“
description: Der „Rust“-Beleuchter packt über das Baldwin-Drama aus: „Jetzt erzähle ich MEINE Version.“Foto: Sergey Svetnoy/Facebook
full_description: Alec Baldwin und die tödliche Filmset-Tragödie. Jetzt erzählt ein Augenzeuge seine Sicht des schrecklichen Unfalls. ER stand neben Halyna Hutchins (†42) in der Sekunde, die alles veränderte. ER hielt die Kamerafrau in seinen Armen, als sie starb. Serge Svetnoy arbeitete genau wie Hutchins mit Leidenschaft HINTER der Kamera. Er war Beleuchter am Set des Western-Films „Rust“. UND ein enger Freund der Toten. Er packt nun aus – in einem Brief mit dem Titel: „Meine Version der ,Rust‘-Tragödie“! ▶︎ Er fasst die dramatischen Minuten nach dem tödlichen Schuss in Worte. ▶︎ Er dankt zwei ganz bestimmten Set-Mitarbeitern. ▶︎ Seine emotionale Abrechnung mit Hollywoods Filmemachern. ▶︎ Und Serge Svetnoy äußert sich auch deutlich zur Waffenmeisterin des Films, die in ihrem Job versagte.

title: Accusé d'avoir des rapports sexuels avec des mineures de moins de 15 ans, Djibril Cissé répond !
creator: no-reply@public.fr (No reply Public.fr)
description: L'affaire de la sextape continue de faire couler de l'encre... Et cette fois-ci, ce n'est pas l'implication de Karim Benzema qui fait parler, mais celle de Djibril Cissé. La raison ? L'ancien... Lire la suite de la news sur Public.fr
full_description: L’affaire de la sextape continue de faire couler de l’encre… Et cette fois-ci, ce n’est pas l’implication de Karim Benzema qui fait parler, mais celle de Djibril Cissé. La raison ? L’ancien attaquant international a été mis en cause par l’un des accusés principaux, Mustapha Zouaoui. Selon lui, l’ancien footballeur devenu DJ aurait eu des rapports sexuels avec des mineures de moins de 15 ans… Des accusations graves qui avaient immédiatement fait réagir le principal intéressé le 21 octobre dernier. « Il insinue quoi, que je suis un pédophile ? Il va se prendre une plainte dans la tête, je vous le dis tout de suite », avait lâché Djibril Cissé sur le plateau de « L'Équipe du soir ». Ni une ni deux, l’ancien participant de Mask Singer a donc annoncé quelques jours plus tard qu’il avait porté plainte pour diffamation. « Monsieur Djibril Cissé a pris connaissance propos tenus le 20 octobre 2021 par Monsieur Mustapha Zouaoui lors de son audience publique du Tribunal correctionnel de Versailles. Ce dernier a notamment prétendu que Monsieur Djibril Cissé avait eu des rapports sexuels avec des mineures âgées de 15 ans. Ces propos diffamatoires sont aujourd’hui abondamment repris par différents médias […]. Par conséquent, Monsieur Djibril Cissé d’ores et déjà engagé et engagera toutes les procédures judiciaires utiles à l’effet d’obtenir réparation de ses préjudices et de faire cesser les calomnies de Monsieur Mustapha Zouaoui », peut-on lire dans une missive dévoilée sur Twitter. Lisa Ziane À voir aussi : à lire aussi

title: Sprzeciwiła się bliskim i wyszła za chłopaka z ludu. Japońska księżniczka Mako straciła tytuł i przeprowadziła się do USA
creator: Karolina Gawot
description: Japońska księżniczka Mako poślubiła niezwiązanego z dworem cesarskim Kei Komurę. Według tamtejszego prawa oznacza to, że straciła jednocześnie swój królewski status.
full_description: Więcej o ślubach gwiazd przeczytacie na Gazeta.pl . Księżniczka Mako w dniu ślubu straciła przysługujące jej tytuły i przywileje. A to oznacza, że zacznie zupełnie nowe życie - zmieni nazwisko, przeprowadzi się do Nowego Jorku, w którym mieszka jej mąż i będzie musiała sama się utrzymywać. Mako zresztą odrzuciła przysługującą jej na mocy przepisów wysoką odprawę finansową. Top 10 sukni ślubnych gwiazd. Pamiętacie te kreacje? Paulina Sykut odsłoniła nogi Ślub księżniczki Mako i Kei Komuro odbył się we wtorek. Nie było żadnych tradycyjnych uroczystości dworskich i medialnych relacji z uroczystości. Para zapowiadała wcześniej, że po ślubie zwoła konferencję prasową, ale ostatecznie małżonkowie zdecydowali się jedynie na wygłoszenie przemówienia i odpowiedzenie na piśmie na kilka pytań dziennikarzy. Kei Komuro i księżniczka Mako EASTNEWS Wokół związku księżniczki Mako i Kei Komuro od początku pojawiało się sporo kontrowersji. Nie popierała go ani rodzina, ani opinia publiczna. Japończycy nie uznali chłopaka wychowanego przez samotną matkę za godnego względów księżniczki. Zazwyczaj partnerzy dla członków rodziny królewskiej są starannie wybierani z tradycyjnych kręgów, z którymi rodzina utrzymuje kontakty. Związek pary i kwestia zaręczyn nie są nowością - Mako i Komuro o swoich planach informowali już w 2017 roku na konferencji prasowej. Choć wówczas mówili o ślubie zaplanowanym na listopad 2018 roku, to ostatecznie musieli przełożyć uroczystość. Chodziło o kontrowersje wokół matki Komuro, która została uwikłana w spór z byłym narzeczonym - ten zarzucał jej, że wykorzystywała jego pieniądze na edukacje syna. Agencja Dworu Cesarskiego wydała wówczas zdawkowe oświadczenie, z którego wynikało, że opóźnienie w kwestii ślubu to kwestia "niedostatecznego przygotowania" pary. Księżniczki Mako i Kei Komuro po ślubie przeprowadzą się do Nowego Jorku, gdzie mężczyzna pracuje jako prawnik. Para planuje możliwie odciąć się od doniesień na swój temat - księżniczka twierdzi, że od kilku lat cierpi na zespół stresu pourazowego (PTSD), wywołany psychicznym znęcaniem się nad nią oraz jej narzeczonym. Beatrycze i Eugenia na królewskim ślubie. Młodsza na czarno, starsza w Gucci Z powodu krytyki i rezygnacji z królewskich przywilejów para często jest porównywana do brytyjskich Royalsów i nazywana "Japan's Harry and Meghan". Zobacz też: Géraldine Guyot wyszła za Alexandra Arnaulta, syna prezesa Louis Vuitton. Na ślubie tłum gwiazd. Beyonce odciągała uwagę od panny młodej

title: Beata Pasik, skazana na 25 lat za rzekome morderstwo w butiku Ultimo, WYSZŁA Z WIĘZIENIA! "Nie jestem mordercą!"
description: W 2003 roku sąd trzeciej instancji skazał Beatę Pasik na 25 lat pozbawienia wolności za zabójstwo oraz usiłowanie zabójstwa. Dziennikarze "Superwizjera" przyjrzeli się na nowo jej sprawie. Skończy się jak sprawa Komendy?
full_description: Niedawno cała Polska żyła sprawą niesłusznie skazanego Tomasza Komendy . Mężczyzna został oskarżony o gwałt i morderstwo 15-latki, do którego miało dojść podczas nocy sylwestrowej w 1996 roku. Wyrokiem sądu Tomasz otrzymał karę w wysokości 25 lat pozbawienia wolności. Przez cały pobyt w więzieniu był torturowany psychicznie oraz fizycznie , co pchnęło go do trzech prób samobójczych. Dopiero 18 lat później w efekcie ponownie wszczętego śledztwa Komenda został uniewinniony i wyszedł na wolność, otrzymując 12 milionów złotych odszkodowania. Zobacz: Sąd Najwyższy uniewinnił Tomasza Komendę! "To otworzy mu drogę do rekordowego odszkodowania" Tomasz Komenda nie jest jedyną niewinną osobą, która z powodu niesprawiedliwego wyroku spędziła lata za kratkami. Po ponad dwóch dekadach od zbrodni w warszawskim butiku Ultimo dziennikarz Superwizjera wziął pod lupę sporną sprawę Beaty Pasik , która w 1997 roku miała postrzelić swoją współpracownicę oraz śmiertelnie ranić jej męża. Pod koniec lat 90. Polską wstrząsnęła makabryczne zabójstwo mające miejsce w jednym z warszawskich butików. 16 grudnia 1997 roku w sklepie z ubraniami doszło do strzelaniny , w wyniku której kierowniczka sklepu doznała ciężkich obrażeń, a jej mąż zmarł. Według Anny J. przewiezionej do szpitala z dwoma ranami postrzałowymi sprawczynią miała być jej współpracownica - Beata Pasik . Jedynym dowodem wskazującym na winę kobiety były zeznania ofiary. Mimo wielokrotnych zapewnień ze strony oskarżonej o niewinności oraz przedstawionemu przez partnera oraz rodzinę oskarżonej alibi, Beata usłyszała wyrok skazujący. Po 18 latach sąd zgodził się na przedterminowe zwolnienie oskarżonej . Po spędzeniu prawie dwóch dekad w areszcie kobieta z rezygnacją skomentowała przykre okoliczności oraz niesprawiedliwość, z jaką się spotkała: Żal mam do wszystkich organów ścigania . Zrobili to ot tak, padło nazwisko, zostałam aresztowana i zostały postawione mi zarzuty bez jakiegokolwiek zbadania tej sprawy, bo ktoś powiedział - wyznała. Były policjant oraz adwokaci podczas rozmowy z reporterami zgodnie stwierdzili, że zebrany materiał dowodowy nie wykazywał postaw do skazania Beaty Pasik, na dodatek jej osobowość poddana analizie przez psychologa nie pasuje do profilu mordercy . Bliscy Beaty Pasik wciąż nie tracą nadziei, że sprawę kobiety uda się wyjaśnić do końca. Niestety, rozwiązania nie doczeka już jej matka, która zmarła kilka lat temu. Bardzo długo czekała na tę chwilę. Widzę ją, jak na tych schodach stoi i żegna mnie. Na pewno widziała, jak ja cierpiałam, jak ją prosiłam o pomoc - opisuje w "Superwizjerze" skazana Pasik. Dzisiaj kobieta, która spędziła w więzieniu 18 lat, apeluje do Anny J., która ją oskarżyła, o "wejrzenie w swoje sumienie": Ona wie bardzo dobrze, kto to zrobił, i proszę ją, żeby nie skazywała mnie na potępienie. Nie zrobiłam tego, nie zabiłam jej męża i nie jestem mordercą. Może to jest najlepsza chwila, żeby się w końcu otrząsnąć i wejrzeć w swoje sumienie, bo ja bym z takim sumieniem nie wytrzymała przez tyle lat . Zobacz: Skazany w sprawie zbrodni miłoszyckiej Norbert Basiura WYSZEDŁ NA WOLNOŚĆ! "Jestem niewinny. Nie mam nic do ukrycia" Czy redaktorzy Pudelka śledzą gwiazdy i robią im zdjęcia zza krzaka? Tego dowiecie się w najnowszym odcinku Pudelek Podcast!

title: Wielka Gala Gwiazd Plejady 2021 - przeżyjmy to jeszcze raz!
content: Wielka Gala Gwiazd Plejady 2021 była wyjątkowym wydarzeniem, które w jednym miejscu zebrało wspaniałych ludzi, dla których najważniejsze jest to, aby pomagać innym. Wśród tegorocznych laureatów znaleźli się Omenaa Mensah, Piotr Łój, Magda Jagnicka, Robert Łukasik i Ewa Minge. Na scenie zaśpiewali Alicja Węgorzewska oraz Tre Voci. Przeżyjmy to jeszcze raz. Obejrzyj ją w całości tylko w Plejada.pl!
full_description: Wielka Gala Gwiazd Plejady 2021. Znamy zwycięzców! Kto wygrał? Wielka Gala Gwiazd Plejady 2021: relacja z czerwonego dywanu Ewa Minge z Super Gwiazdą Plejady 2021. Nie kryła wzruszenia Podczas Wielkiej Gali Gwiazd Plejady 2021 po raz pierwszy nagrodziliśmy osoby, które znane są nie tylko z pierwszych stron gazet, ale przede wszystkim z bezinteresownej pomocy potrzebującym. Statuetki – Gwiazdy Plejady – zostały wręczone w następujących kategoriach: Opowieść o pomoc y, Opowieść o oddaniu , Opowieść o bezinteresowności , Opowieść o szlachetności , Opowieść o wsparciu , Opowieść o trosce , Opowieść o sercu. Tegoroczna edycja wydarzenia opowiadała o ludziach, których można określić 7 słowami-kluczami: pomocą, oddaniem, wsparciem, bezinteresownością, szlachetnością, troską i sercem. W kategorii Opowieść o pomocy nagrodę otrzymał Piotr Łój , założyciel fundacji Virtual Deam, specjalista VR, producent filmów VR360, społecznik, który nie tylko bada, jak najlepiej wykorzystać wirtualne światy, ale przede wszystkim pokazuje, jak technologia może pomagać. Lekarz weterynarii Radosław Fedaczyński, który wymyślił centrum adopcyjne dla zwierząt bezdomnych, psią wioskę, pogotowie dla niedźwiedzi, przedszkole bocianie i pierwszą szkołę latania dla ptaków, został laureatem w kategorii Opowieść o oddaniu . W kategorii Opowieść o bezinteresowności Gwiazdę Plejady otrzymała Jolanta Broda , współzałożycielka i administratorka grupy wsparcia Pies w Koronie. Robert Łukasik , prezes Zjednoczenia Pozytywni w Tęczy, edukator seksualny, trener antydyskryminacyjny, profilaktyk zdrowia otrzymał wyróżnienie w kategorii Opowieść o wsparciu . W kategorii Opowieść o trosce Gwiazdę Plejady otrzymała Magda Jagnicka , stylistka, która żyje nie tylko modą i sesjami dla najpopularniejszych magazynów modowych. Przemysław Szaliński , założyciel fundacji Przemek Dzieciom został laureatem w kategorii Opowieść o sercu . Resztę artykułu znajdziesz pod materiałem wideo: W kategorii Opowieść o szlachetności przyznaliśmy dwie specjalne nagrody: statuetki Super Gwiazd Plejady. Pierwszą z nich otrzymała Ewa Minge , projektantka mody i założycielka fundacji Black Butterflies. Drugą otrzymała Omenaa Mensah , prezenterka telewizyjna, założycielka Omenaa Foundation. Wielką Galę Gwiazd Plejady poprowadził Grzegorz Dobek , szef serwisu Plejada oraz Marcin Cejrowski , ambasador showbiznesu Ringier Axel Springer Polska i twórca plebiscytu Gwiazdy Plejady, a "Czerwony Dywan" – Kamila Glińska i Karolina Pisarek. Nagrody laureatom wręczyli: Alicja Węgorzewska, Emma Kiworkowa, Ewa Błaszczyk, Doda, Joanna Szczypek, Łukasz Kadziewicz, Paweł Makowski (UseCrypt), Irena Santor, Viki Gabor, Bogna Sworowska, Adam Mamom (Essilor) oraz Małgorzata Ohme i Joanna Przetakiewicz. Gwiazdami muzycznymi tegorocznej Wielkiej Gali Gwiazd Plejady byli: Alicja Węgorzewska oraz Tre Voci. Chcesz podzielić się ciekawym newsem lub zaproponować temat? Skontaktuj się z nami, pisząc maila na adres: plejada@redakcjaonet.pl . Dziękujemy, że przeczytałaś/eś nasz artykuł do końca. Jeśli chcesz być na bieżąco z życiem gwiazd, zapraszamy do naszego serwisu ponownie!

title: Satyameva Jayate 2 Trailer Out Now: Release Date, Cast and All You Need to Know
creator: Sentinel Digital Desk
description: Satyameva Jayate 2 is a Bollywood movie directed by Milap Zaveri starring John Abraham. Know about the release date, cast and songs of the movie
content: Satyameva Jayate 2 is a much-awaited Hindi movie directed by Milap Zaveri with intense character and action in the movie. The movie is an Emmay Entertainment and T-series production. The trailer of the movie has been released on Monday, 25 October which has already gained much attention of the viewers. The story of the movie is all about raising a voice against the injustice prevailing in society and the misuse and exploitation of power. The first part of the movie Satyameva Jayate released in 2018 on Independence Day was a great success because of its story and vigilante action. Therefore fans are excited and eager to watch the second part as Satyameva Jayate 2 as it is going to hit theatres. RELEASE DATE: The release date of the upcoming movie Satyameva Jayate 2 is Thursday 25 November 2021. It was earlier decided to release on 26 November but postponed later so now it is releasing a day earlier than the scheduled date. Actor John Abraham took to Twitter to share information on the release date of the action drama Satyameva Jayate 2. He tweeted that Satyameva Jayate 2 is going to bring double the action and entertainment in cinemas on 25 November and the trailer is made available on 25 October. CAST OF SATYAMEVA JAYATE 2: The movie stars John Abraham as the lead character with triple roles which includes a father and twin sons with names of the characters as Vijay Singh Azaad, Satya Prakash Azaad and Jaideep "Jai" Azaad. Other cast includes known celebrities such as Divya Khosla Kumar playing the powerful role of Sita Rameshwasri, Anup Soni playing as an Inspector named Manish Zaveri, Harsh Chhaya appearing as Anupam Menaria and Rajeev Pillai. SONGS OF SATYAMEVA JAYATE 2: Some of the notable songs of the movie include the title track Satyameva Jayate and Dilduba. The songs of the movie are by Payal Dev, Rochak Kohli, Arko, Tanishk Bagchi and Jass Manak. WATCH SATYAMEVA JAYATE TRAILER: Also read: Prakash Jha's web series set attackedAlso watch:

title: Rust cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was killed after Alec Baldwin rehearsed pointing gun at camera, affidavit reveals
description: An affidavit that provides new details into the circumstances of the shooting was released on October 24 in which the film’s director Joel Souza said that Rust cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was killed while Alec Baldwin was rehearsing a scene that involved the actor pointing a revolver in the direction of a camera lens. According to Variety, Souza, who was also injured in the on-set accident, said that the cast and crew had been assured that Baldwin was handling a “cold gun,” meaning it had no live rounds. According to the safety protocols that need to be followed by the film’s armorer, Hannah Gutierrez-Reed and Rust assistant director Dave Halls were required to check and make sure that the barrel was empty by double-checking before the firearm was handed to the actors. When the incident took place, Souza and Hutchins were standing behind the camera to see the angle and Baldwin was sitting on a wooden pew facing south towards the camera and crew, outfitted in Western garb. Reid Russell, a cameraman who was standing next to the two, told police that he “remembered Joel having blood on his person, and Ms. Hutchins speaking and saying she couldn’t feel her legs.” Souza told investigators that Hutchins grabbed her midsection, at which point he noticed he was bleeding from his shoulder. Hutchins was pronounced dead October 21 after being airlifted to an Albuquerque hospital. She was 42. The Rust production broke for lunch around 12:30 p.m. on Thursday. When the cast and crew returned back to the set after lunch, Souza said he was not sure if the firearm that Baldwin was using was checked again. Hutchins’ death has prompted calls for greater safety measures on sets and inspired a petition on change.org to ban the use of real firearms on sets. That petition has drawn more than 25,000 signatories. The producers of the movie Rust announced on Sunday that they are suspending production while sheriffs investigate Hutchins’ death. Also Read: Audio of emergency call reveals shock and confusion after Alec Baldwin shooting tragedy on Rust set

title: ฤกษ์มาแล้ว! ‘เจนนี่ รัชนก’ แจ้งกำหนดการงานแต่ง ขออภัยไม่ได้เชิญอย่างเป็นทางการ
keywords: บันเทิงไทย
ยิว ฉัตรมงคล
เจนนี่ ได้หมดถ้าสดชื่น
creator: The Bangkok Insight Editorial Team
description: ลูกทุ่งสาวคนดัง “เจนนี่ รัชนก” แจ้งกำหนดการ […]
content: ลูกทุ่งสาวคนดัง “เจนนี่ รัชนก” แจ้งกำหนดการงานแต่ง เตรียมจูงมือหวานใจหนุ่ม “ยิว ฉัตรมงคล” ขออภัยที่ไม่ได้เชิญอย่างเป็นทางการ ออกมาประกาศข่าวดีให้แฟน ๆ ได้เฮลั่น สำหรับคู่ของนักร้องลูกทุ่งสาวคนดัง เจนนี่-รัชนก สุวรรณเกตุ กับหวานใจตำรวจหนุ่ม ยิว ฉัตรมงคล หลังจากที่ทั้งคู่คบหาดูใจ พร้อมจูงมือฝ่าฟันมรสุมชีวิตมาด้วยกัน คอยอยู่เคียงข้างเป็นกำลังใจคนสำคัญ กระทั่งได้ออกมาประกาศข่าวดีเรื่องทายาท เตรียมขึ้นแท่นเป็นคุณพ่อคุณแม่มือใหม่ พร้อมเดินหน้าสร้างครอบครัวในอนาคต ก่อนที่ฝ่ายชายจะคุกเข่าขอเจนนี่แต่งงานกลางเรือยอร์ช ท่ามกลางเพื่อนพ้องคนสนิท รวมถึงแฟน ๆ ที่เข้ามาคอมเมนท์ร่วมแสดงความยินดีกันอย่างคับคั่ง “เจนนี่ รัชนก” แจ้งกำหนดการงานแต่ง ขออภัยไม่ได้เชิญเป็นทางการ ล่าสุด (26 ต.ค.) เจนนี่ ก็ได้ออกมาแจงกำหนดงานแต่งงานเป็นที่เรียบร้อยแล้ว โดยเจ้าตัวเผยว่า กำหนดงานแต่งยิวเจน พิธีเช้า 11 พ.ย 2564 ณ ค่ายเพลง ได้หมดถ้าสดชื่น งานเลี้ยงเย็น 12 พ.ย 2564 โรงแรมดุสิตธานี จ.กระบี่ ต้องขออภัยพี่ ๆ น้อง ๆ เพื่อน ๆ ทุกท่าน ที่ตอนนี้ยังไม่ได้เรียนเชิญทุกท่านอย่างเป็นทางการ เพราะต้องรอคำสั่งตอนต้นเดือนอีกครั้ง ว่าในงานสามารถเชิญแขกเต็มที่ได้จำนวนกี่คน และทุกอย่างต้องเป็นไปตามมาตรการการป้องกันที่ถูกต้อง เมื่อได้คำตอบที่ชัดเจนแล้ว จะเรียนเชิญและแจ้งทุกท่านให้ทราบอีกทีภายหลังนะคะ และขออภัยล่วงหน้าหากงานเลี้ยงไม่สามารถจัดเต็มที่และไม่ได้เรียนเชิญทุกท่านมาร่วมงานได้ทุกคน ตอนนี้ลุ้นมากค่ะว่าจะสามารถจัดเต็มที่ได้กี่คน รอ ๆ นะคะ อ่านข่าวเพิ่มเติม อัพเดทความหล่อ ‘น้องออโต้’ ลูกชายคนโต ‘แม่โบว์’ ยิ่งโตยิ่งออร่าจับ ฉายแววศิลปิน อดแซวไม่ได้! มาดู ‘ชมพู่’ ว่าไง หลังเห็น ‘น็อต วิศรุต’ ปล่อยช็อตนี้ โผล่เม้นทันที โป๊ะแล้วหนึ่ง! ‘นิวเคลียร์’ ตอบเองเลย หลังเอฟซีจับผิดสวมแหวนนิ้วนางข้างซ้าย?

full_description: Il existe une multitude de téléviseurs 4K et il n'est pas facile de choisir. Aujourd'hui, on vous propose un bon plan pour l'excellente SmartTV Android Sony XR55X90J et cette dernière ne pourra que vous satisfaire. Sony XR55X90J : Une Android TV 4K UHD de qualité Sony est une marque reconnue dans le monde des TV et elle a su se démarquer de la concurrence en développant de nombreuses technologies permettant d'avoir une image irréprochable. La Sony XR55X90J est un modèle Full Array LED arborant une belle diagonale de 55 pouces, soit environ 139 cm. De plus, elle offre un taux de rafraichissement exceptionnelle de 100 Hz et même dans certaines conditions jusqu'à 120 Hz . Ce modèle dispose aussi de la technologie XRMotion Clarity qui détecte les zones de l’image en mouvement rapide pour en améliorer la fluidité tout en conservant un fort niveau de contraste. Ce n'est pas tout, elle est compatible HDR. Elle est vraiment parfaite pour les consoles. Pour le son, elle est certifiée DTS Digital Surround , vous aurez donc une qualité audio au top. Sony a choisi Android TV comme système d'exploitation, vous aurez donc un accès au Play Store de Google et ses applications. Vous pourrez aussi installer Netflix, Amazon Prime Vidéo, Molotov, Disney+, MyCanal et bien d'autres. Vendue habituellement au prix de 1299 euros, elle est désormais à 1099 euros, soit une économie de 200 euros sur son prix de départ. 3 bonnes raisons de la commander ? Qualité d'image Sony Android TV et ses Apps Taux de rafraichissement Profiter de cette super offre sur la Sony XR55X90J Les liens d'affiliation L'équipe d'Hitek sélectionne pour vous les meilleurs bons plans disponibles sur le web. title: „Bauer sucht Frau“-Spoiler: Hottie Björn nimmt diese 5 Frauen zu sich auf den Hof
description: Björn verlässt das Scheunenfest bei der neuen Staffel „Bauer sucht Frau“ mit gleich fünf Damen um den Arm. Das sind die Auserwählten des Hessen.
full_description: + © Stefan Gregorowius/RTL Björn sucht bei „Bauer sucht Frau“ seine Traumfrau – und findet gleich fünf. © Stefan Gregorowius/RTL Björn verlässt das Scheunenfest bei der neuen Staffel „Bauer sucht Frau“ mit gleich fünf Damen um den Arm. Das sind die Auserwählten des Hessen. Hessen – Schon bevor die neue Staffel „Bauer sucht Frau“ losgeht, ist klar, wer der diesjährige Bauer-Hottie des Jahres wird. Björn hat lange blonde Haare, er spielt Gitarre und singt in einer Band, natürlich schreibt er auch seine eigenen Songtexte. Sollte also niemanden überraschen, dass sein Briefkasten nur so vor Bewerbungsschreiben explodierte. Auf dem Scheunenfest muss er sich dann entscheiden – und entscheidet sich dafür, gleich fünf Frauen mit zu sich auf den Hof zu nehmen. Welche fünf Frauen Hottie Björn mit zu sich auf den Hof nimmt, verrät 24hamburg.de*. Ob auch wirklich Björns Traumfrau unter seinen fünf Auserwählten ist, das kann nur die Zeit zeigen. Eines muss man dem Agraringenieur aus Hessen aber zugestehen: Er lässt wirklich nichts anbrennen. * 24hamburg.de ist ein Angebot von IPPEN.MEDIA .

title: „Der Teddy“ bei „The Masked Singer“: Ist er schon enttarnt? Fans haben Verdacht
description: Endlich ist es wieder soweit und die Fans von „The Masked Singer“ 2021 können wieder fleißig mitraten, wer unter den bunten Kostümen steckt. Einer der...
full_description: Endlich ist es wieder soweit und die Fans von „ The Masked Singer “ 2021 können wieder fleißig mitraten, wer unter den bunten Kostümen steckt. Einer der Unbekannten in diesem Jahr ist „ Der Teddy “. Man muss zugeben, das putzige Kuscheltier ist augenscheinlich schon ein bisschen in die Jahre gekommen. Mit einigen Gebrauchsspuren am Körper von „ Der Teddy “ steht der süße Plüsch-Freund auf der Bühne. Sein Aussehen lässt darauf schließen, dass er früher heiß und innig gebliebt wurde. Immerhin hat das niedliche „ The Masked Singer “-Kostüm bereits das ein oder andere Loch – Wolle quillt aus der Nase, aus dem Ohr, aus den Beinen. „Der Teddy“ bei „The Masked Singer“ 2021: Wer steckt unter der süßen Maske? Da bleibt nur zu hoffen, dass die 'Wunden' den Teddy nicht beim Singen stören, schließlich möchte sich das Stofftier mit Sicherheit bei Konkurrenten wie dem Mops oder Hammerhai gut schlagen und die Jury mit seinem Gesang beeindrucken. Doch wer könnte sich unter der niedlichen Teddy-Maske verstecken? Ein Name liegt da natürlich auf der Hand. „Muss ja ganz klar Teddy Teclebrhan sein“, schreibt ein Fan von „The Masked Singer“ bei Instagram. Na, wenn das mal nicht zu einfach ist. ----------------------------- „Der Teddy“ bei „The Masked Singer“: Die Hinweise Wurde in der Waschmaschine mitgewaschen Ist verloren gegangen Musste im Fundbüro auf das Wiedersehen warten Hat sein eigenes Fundbüro eröffnet „Teddys Fundgrube – Hier macht das Wiedersehen Freude“ Erinnert sich an Freunde aus Frankreich, die ihn immer wieder verloren und wiedergefunden haben Hält einen Fußball in den Händen Zählen auf Französisch bis drei -------------------------------- Gute Geschichten kann Teddy Teclebrhan mit Sicherheit erzählen, das bewies er schon in der Amazon-Comedy „Lol“. Aber ob er auch singen kann? ---------------------------------------- Das sind die Tipps der Fans: Lena Gercke Teddy Teclebrhan Julia Leischik Sarah Harrison ---------------------------------------- Nach dem ersten Auftritt haben die Fans aber eine ganz andere Vermutung: Julia Leischik soll unter dem plüschigen Kostüm stecken. Die Hinweise wäre nicht ganz unpassend: Die Blondine moderiert immerhin die Sendung „Julia Leischik sucht“, in der sie Menschen dabei hilft, vermisste Angehörige wiederzufinden. Die Vermutung, dass vielleicht Ex-„Bachelor“-Kandidatin und Influencerin Sarah Harrison unter der Maske stecken könnte, sorgt im Netz für reichlich Diskussion. Die Zweifach-Mama, die eigentlich mit ihrer Familie in Dubai lebt, befindet sich seit zwei Wochen in Deutschland. Vielleicht, um heimlich an der Verkleidungsshow teilzunehmen? „Es waren 2 Kinder zu sehen. So einen großen Teddybär haben sie auch zu Hause. Sie wusste vor kurzem nicht, wie lange sie in Deutschland bleibt“, fasst ein Fan zusammen. ----------------------------------------- Mehr zu den „The Masked Singer“-Kandidaten: „Der Mops“ bei „The Masked Singer“: Fans sicher – ER steckt unter der Maske „Der Hammerhai bei The Masked Singer: Steckt ER unter der Maske? „Das Stinktier bei The Masked Singer: Haben die Fans IHN erkannt? „Die Heldin“ bei „The Masked Singer“: Fans tippen auf SIE „Das Axolotl“ bei „The Masked Singer“: Fan vermutet IHN unter der Maske „Der Phönix“ bei „The Masked Singer“ 2021: Fans sind sich sicher – „Kein Zweifel“ --------------------------------------- Eins der „The Masked Singer”-Kostüme tritt in diesem Jahr außer Konkurrenz an. Wer das ist und warum, liest du hier. Der erste Promi musste bereits seine Maske fallen lassen. Wer das war und was er dazu zu sagen hatte, das liest du hier. Promis und Royals Promis und Royals

title: The Witcher 2, la nuova immagine di Henry Cavill nei panni di Geralt esalta i fan [FOTO]
creator: Cristiano Bolla
description: Lo Strigo è pronto a tornare su Netflix dal 17 dicembre
content: Conto alla rovescia per l’uscita della seconda stagione di The Witcher, la serie basata sull’omonima saga letteraria e videoludica che ha per protagonista Henry Cavill. Geralt of Rivia tornerà su Netflix il 17 dicembre ed è stata diffusa una nuova immagine in grado di alzare nuovamente l’hype dei fan in attesa. A condividerla è Empire, che dedica un articolo al cacciatore di mostri le cui imprese continueranno ad essere esplorate nella seconda stagione. Nello scatto, vediamo proprio lo Strigo Geralt in posa da combattimento in quella che sembra essere Kaer Morhen. Il pallore e il contorno scuro degli occhi inoltre fanno pensare che sia sotto l’effetto di qualche pozione, un tratto comune sia ai libri di Andrzej Sapkowski che ai videogiochi della CD PROJEKT RED.  QUI POTETE VEDERE LA FOTO DI THE WITCHER 2 Dai nuovi episodi, i fan possono aspettarsi finalmente l’incontro tra Geralt e Ciri, solo sfiorato al termine della prima stagione: le loro due storie correvano su linee temporali diverse, ma proprio sul finale i loro destini si sono incrociati.  Durante il TUDUM Netflix di poche settimane fa, sono state mostrate alcune clip esclusive della serie in cui si vedono appunto i due grandi e attesi protagonisti. Per i fan dell’universo del cacciatore di mostri, è già disponibile sulla piattaforma lo spin-off animato Nightmare of the Wolf (QUI la nostra recensione) che esplora le origini di Vesemir, il mentore di Geralt e nuovo personaggio di The Witcher 2. Di seguito la sinossi ufficiale della seconda stagione: The Witcher, serie fantasy basata sull’omonima saga bestseller, è il racconto epico di una famiglia e del suo destino. La storia dei destini intrecciati di tre individui nel vasto mondo de Il Continente, dove umani, elfi, witcher, gnomi e mostri combattono per sopravvivere e dove il bene e il male non sono facilmente identificabili. Nella seconda stagione, convinto che Yennefer sia morta nell’epica battaglia di Colle Sodden, Geralt di Rivia porta Ciri nel luogo più sicuro che conosce, la sua casa d’infanzia, Kaer Morhen. Mentre i re, gli elfi, gli umani e i demoni del Continente lottano per la supremazia fuori dalle sue mura, Geralt di Rivia deve proteggere la ragazza da qualcosa di molto più pericoloso: il misterioso potere dentro di sé. Nel ricco cast dello show troviamo: Henry Cavill (Geralt di Rivia), Anya Chalotra (Yennefer), Freya Allan (Ciri), Jodhi May (Calanthe), Kim Bodnia (Vesemir), Björn Hlynur Haraldsson (Eist), Adam Levy (Mousesack), MyAnna Buring (Tissaia), Mimi Ndiweni (Fringilla), Therica Wilson-Read (Sabrina), Emma Appleton (Renfri), Eamon Farren (Cahir), Joey Batey (Jaskier), Lars Mikkelsen (Stregobor), Royce Pierreson (Istredd), Maciej Musiał (Sir Lazlo), Wilson Radjou-Pujalte (Dara) e Anna Shaffer (Triss). Foto: Netflix Fonte: Empire

title: Sooryavanshi song Mera Yaaraa: Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif weave magic in Arijit Singh's romantic melody
description: The excitement for Rohit Shetty directorial Sooryavanshi has been there ever since its inception. The film which was supposed to release last year got postsponed because of the coronavirus pandemic. Well now, the Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Ranveer Singh and Ajay Devgn starrer is all set to release in the theatres on the occasion of Diwali ie November 5. While everyone is waiting for the big day, the makers have been increasing the excitement levels by sharing various songs and BTS videos. And yet again, the announcement of another one made our day special. Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the lead jodi shared the teaser of their romantic song 'Mera Yaaraa' which has been crooned by none other than Arijit Singh.
full_description: The excitement for directorial Sooryavanshi has been there ever since its inception. The film which was supposed to release last year got postsponed because of the coronavirus pandemic. Well now, the , , and Ajay Devgn starrer is all set to release in the theatres on the occasion of Diwali ie November 5. While everyone is waiting for the big day, the makers have been increasing the excitement levels by sharing various songs and BTS videos. And yet again, the announcement of another one made our day special. Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the lead jodi shared the teaser of their romantic song 'Mera Yaaraa' which has been crooned by none other than Arijit Singh. Akshay and Katrina in the track can be seen enjoying romantic time in the green fields and the boats on a beach. The highlight of the song remained the momet when Akshay goes down on his knees and proposes Katrina with a ring in a dreamy setting. Sharing the glimpse of the same, the Bollywood actor wrote, "When her one smile makes you smile…let's cherish the romance with #MereYaaraa, song out tomorrow.... Come #BackToCinemas with #Sooryavanshi on 5th November. @arijitsingh @neetimohan18." While for Katrina, she wrote in the caption, "#merayaara SONG OUT TOMORROW with the beautiful voices of @arijitsingh @neetimohan18 #sooryavanshi #backtocinema." 'Sooryavanshi' is a continuation of the cop action 'Singham' universe, which began with the Ajay Devgn starrer 'Singam' and 'Singham Returns', then expanded with 'Simmba', starring Ranveer Singh and Devgn, and now is going forward with Akshay's character. The makers, a few days back released the first song 'Aila Re Aillaa' which left everyone impressed. See it here: Just recently, Katrina shared a hilarious behind-the-scenes video from the first promotions. Taking to her Instagram handle, Katrina shared a video in which she could be sarcastically seen saying, "So guys, this is the first day of promotions for Sooryavanshi, and I have never seen Rohit sir and Akshay so excited, they are ready to go, they are full of energy, they are like," and turns the camera to capture Rohit and Akshay resting. The moment both of them realise that they are being captured by Katrina, they ask her to stop. "Don't record," Rohit could be heard telling Katrina. "Arre but you wake up at 5 in the morning, you must be tired," Katrina teases Akshay, who asks her, "What are you doing? We have a reputation," and both Akshay and Rohit run away from Katrina in a hurry. In 'Sooryavanshi' Akshay will be seen portraying the role of a DSP who fights crime. Katrina will be playing the role of Akshay's love interest in the film. Don't forget to watch the trailer here:

title: Bigg Boss 5 Telugu Episode 51 Highlights
creator: Vyas
description: The episode started with the housemates dancing to the 'Chitti Aayire' song. Ravi is seen talking about how Lobo made such statements in the confession room.
content: Bigg Boss 5 Telugu Episode 51 Highlights Bigg Boss 5 Telugu Episode 51 Highlights The episode started with the housemates dancing to the 'Chitti Aayire' song. Ravi is seen talking about how Lobo made such statements in the confession room. Lobo cried and apologized to Ravi. Later, Lobo also apologized to Anne. Bigg Boss starts the nominations task. The postman brings two letters and only one can get the letter. The 2 people who got the letters have to convince each other. The person who won't get the letter will go into nominations. Maanas and Sreeram bring the letters and dump them in the garden area. Lobo and Priyanka's letters come first. Lobo accepts to give Priyanka's letter. Lobo's letter goes into the shredder and he cried. Priyanka reads out the letter and became emotional. Ravi picks Siri and Viswa's letters. Viswa asks her to give him the letter as he didn't even get the letter from his kid before. Siri accepted to give him the letter as she also knows how it would be to have a kid and not know his whereabouts. Siri reads the letter for Viswa. Anne and Maanas get the letter. Maanas gives it up and Anne thanked him and reads the letter. Priyanka gets emotional too. Lobo and Viswa pick Sreeram and Ravi's letters. Sreeram wanted to give it up to Ravi. But, Lobo stops him and tries to convince Ravi by saying that Ravi has already got a letter, a video, and also a doll but Sreeram got nothing. Ravi accepts and gives the letter to Sreeram who reads and becomes happy. Shannu and Kajal get the letters. Shannu initially claimed that his mother survived cancer and he wanted to know how she is doing but gives it up for Kajal. Shannu said that his mother is his inspiration. He said that she survived cancer and so many struggles in life and he can survive it too. Sunny as a captain gets power. He can directly pick a saved contestant to go into nomination and keep their letter into a shredder to give Jessie the letter from his family. Sunny leaves the decision with the saved contestants. Sreeram brings his letter and claimed that he is fine with it. Ravi comes up and claims that Shannu, Siri, and Jessie should clear the vacuum with Sreeram now. Siri said that it is not right to bring it up in this situation. Sreeram, Shannu says that they are okay with whatever is there in between them. Sunny also said that it is not right. Jessie reads the letter from his mother. Bigg Boss announced that Lobo, Siri, Shannu, Maanas, Ravi, and Sreeram are in nominations. Bigg Boss added that he also got the letter from his family and he will get it unconditionally as he is the captain. Sunny reads the letter from his mother and feels happy.

title: Devin Ratray: età, instagram e film con il noto attore
creator: Linda Iacobino
description: Devin Ratray è un noto attore americano. Nato a New York l’11 gennaio del 1977, ha 44 anni. La sua carriera cinematografica comincia quando ancora era un bambino. Infatti, la sua prima apparizione risale al 1986 in “Io vi salverò“, il film diretto da Bruce Malmuth. Con l’inizio del nuovo decennio, Ratray appare nel cast […]
content: Devin Ratray è un noto attore americano. Nato a New York l’11 gennaio del 1977, ha 44 anni. La sua carriera cinematografica comincia quando ancora era un bambino. Infatti, la sua prima apparizione risale al 1986 in “Io vi salverò“, il film diretto da Bruce Malmuth. Con l’inizio del nuovo decennio, Ratray appare nel cast di Mamma ho perso l’aereo, dove interpreta il personaggio di Buzz McCallister. Sempre nello stesso periodo, Devin debutta anche sul piccolo schermo, recitando in: Heartland, Law & Order – I due volti della giustizia e tante altre serie tv. Su Instagram l’attore ha un profilo con più di 9 mila followers (@devinratray). Devin Ratray film Ma dove è possibile vedere la presenza di Davin Ratray? A tal proposito, ecco le sue esperienze più significative: Piccoli mostri (Little Monsters), con la regia di Richard Greenberg (nel 1989) Mamma, ho perso l’aereo (Home Alone), con la regia di Chris Columbus (nel 1990) Mamma, ho riperso l’aereo: mi sono smarrito a New York (Home Alone 2: Lost in New York), con la regia di Chris Columbus (nel 1992) Dennis la minaccia, con la regia di Nick Castle (nel 1993) Un principe tutto mio (The Prince and Me), con la regia di Martha Coolidge (nel 2004) Slippery Slope, con la regia di Sarah Schenck (nel 2006) Serial, con la regia di Kevin Arbouet e L. J. Strong (nel 2007) Ma anche: Il mondo dei replicanti (Surrogates), con la regia di Jonathan Mostow (nel 2009) Elevator, con la regia di Stig Svendsen (nel 2011) R.I.P.D. – Poliziotti dall’aldilà, con la regia di Robert Schwentke (nel 2013) Nebraska, con la regia di Alexander Payne (nel 2013) Blue Ruin, con la regia di Jeremy Saulnier (nel 2013) The Lennon Report, con la regia di Jeremy Profe (nel 2016) Masterminds – I geni della truffa, con la regia di Jared Hess (nel 2016) Le ragazze di Wall Street – Business Is Business, con la regia di Lorene Scafaria (nel 2019)

title: Bigg Boss 15: Tejasswi Prakash appreciates wild card entry Rajiv Adatia says, "He has done more than Akasa and Simba in just one day"
description: Recently, the Bigg Boss 15 house saw a new wild card entry who made an impact on the very first day. Entrepreneur Rajiv Adatia who's a very well known face in the Bollywood industry created waves with his entry on the very first day on the show. He has surely entered the show on a very promising note and seems to add a lot of flavour to the show. On the other hand, Tejasswi was the first one to be called to the nomination room wherein she was about to take Vishal's name but then ended up taking Simba and Akasa's name. While stating her reason, Tejasswi said "Rajiv has done more than Akasa and Simba in just one day" The statement made by Tejasswi shows that Rajiv is surely one of the strongest contenders and wild-card contestants. He has surely entered the house to set the records straight with some people and has been maintaining the same since Day 1. Let's see how the time unfolds and what more Mr Adatia has to give to the show. title: Vijay Deverakonda to join Balakrishna?
